===Technical Details=== *Model: VIA APC 8750 *Software: Android 2.3 *Chip: VIA 800MHz Processor *Memory: RAM: 512MB (DDR3), Flash: 2GB (NAND) *Graphics: Built-in 2D/3D Graphic (720p) *Input and Output: HDMI, VGA, Audio out/Mic in :USB: 4x USB 2.0, microSD Card slot *Network: 1x 10/100 Ethernet *Size: 170 x 85 mm (W x H) :Neo ITX Standard
